about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Dinos Reborn and feel like a dinosaur hunter!
Danger awaits you at every turn. Think fast and don't hesitate, because every second lost can turn you from hunter to prey...
Dinos Reborn is an open world game with a sci-fi atmosphere. Try to survive on this dangerous planet overrun by dinosaurs.

Weapon Customization


Modify your arsenal. Choose from silencers, grips, scopes and other accessories. Create the perfect weapon and go on the hunt.

Diverse World

Explore a world of danger and monumental sights. Don't be fooled by the beauty of your surroundings. Death awaits you at every turn.

Advanced Dinosaur Behaviour

A dozen species of dinosaurs, in the sky and on the ground. Each with its own unique survival instincts. Analyse their tracks, observe their habits, look for weaknesses and find the best moment to attack.

Random Drops

Keep an eye out for random airdrops of supplies. The contents of these mysterious packages will help you in your fight for survival on this dangerous planet.

Dangerous Environment

In this world, both flora and fauna pose a deadly threat to humans. Here you must think through every move you make. The rules are simple - kill or be killed.

name: Dinos Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 / AMD Radeon RX 460
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 / Radeon RX 580

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of Dinos Reborn and feel like a dinosaur hunter! Danger awaits you at every turn. Think fast and don't hesitate, because every second lost can turn you from hunter to prey...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
